basics.name: Justina Desriute
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Started in the adult world as a lawyer in European criminal law area and made a decision to change path to programming since law was not challenging and cretive enough for this lifetime.

work.summary: Web Development using Polymer (JS framework), back-end tasks mainly with Python and SQL. Testing with Nightwatch, continuous integration with Circle CI. Overall deployment of the project in AWS, using Docker and Kubernetes.

volunteer.summary: Learning/Training organisation for people willing to learn how to code
Organising events (trainings, meetups, conferences etc.) to encourage females engage in technology more

publications.name: What is REPODS platform all about?
publications.summary: An overview article on the features of an online-data-warehouse platform REPODS.

publications.name: Complex Infographs with d3.js in REPODS: adding interactivity
publications.summary: Follow-up article on how to add interactivity to a complex infograph in REPODS platform

publications.name: Interactive Infographs with d3.js in REPODS: preparing the structure of the infograph
publications.summary: Guide-through style article on how to create custom interactive infographs in REPODS platform usign d3.js

publications.name: Interactive Infographs with d3.js in REPODS: preparing the structure of the infograph
publications.summary: Introductory article on how to create custom infographs with d3.js in REPODS platform

references.name: Marko Petzold
references.reference: She is very dedicated, very skilled and has a very positive spirit. A great contribution to our startup.
